meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adrian Ho Michelle DeGrothy Seth Tribble Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6750.

td.p: Adrian Ho, a healthcare consultant from Palo Alto, California
Michelle DeGrothy, a Navy helicopter pilot from Neptune Beach, Florida
Seth Tribble, a statistician from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,488)

tr.td: SHELVING! YES, SHELVING!
"AD" VERBS
VACATION
THE MOOSE OUT FRONT
SHOULD'VE TOLD YOU
